q: . He made no defense for Barack Obama 's misstatements and lies. He made no comments about the specific details in the email to Barack Obama . Instead, Colin Powell 's letter to me included these two comments: The email is the usual anecdotal, out of context attacks, rather than a serious attempt to help the American people understand the issues. "Yes, 95 percent of blacks will vote for Barack Obama . Maybe you should be asking why?" Since when is character not an important issue? The presidential election is an interview process

Allen Iverson , the NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said. "He's been in tremendous agony." Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. "We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products that can still carry a lot of people but won't look like traditional minivans. spark for Detroit Red after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
